system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Fencing Swords)}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WGoOFcYvOi7LaB0E]{Fencing Martial Arts}

Benefits

When wielding a sabre, cutlass, rapier, parrying dagger, sai, or jitte, the character receives a +4 bonus to all Disarm attempts and a +4 bonus to all attacks against their weapon. The character can also increase the Combat Point cost of an attack with made with a sabre, cutlass, rapier or parrying dagger by 2 Combat Points and make a touch attack with the weapon.

Normal

Fencing swords can only make normal attacks.
system.summary: +4 Disarm Bonus, +4 Weapon defense, touch attack for +2 CP
